vTqPoYU9LpIfWJAcOsfpCw.text: Love the wings, love the buffo shrimp and love the pizza! I haven't been disappointed yet by TLC but the real kicker and reason I am giving them 5 stars is because they deliver! Love to see a smaller restaurant like this deliver and I'm going to be honest they have the BEST buffalo chicken pizza I have ever had. That chicken is soooooo much better than any other pizza chain I have tried before! Highly recommend to anyone if you are craving some pizza and wings!

LhSRF73rVDWOxkeVLr-VMQ.text: Best wings I've had in Charlotte so far! Cajun Ranch is amazing!!!

iEqApeg9OysoY7jjVzvxEg.text: I've been a longtime loyal customer of this place (2005). My husband and I just called to order delivery and the girl that answered the phone hung up on him. When I called back she told me "that wasn't me, it must've somebody else. " When I spoke to the "manager" he said they weren't delivering tonight.  On Super Bowl Sunday.  A wing place.  Not delivering.  Ok. I don't need to spend my money there.

Mix3iPwdl2nYAe5wQVWIVg.text: I've ordered twice and the first time they allowed me to order under $20 and receive delivery. The second time I ordered they said it was a minimum $20 delivery but when my neighbor ordered under $20 right before i called with no problem. Very unsatisfactory seeing as I'm within 5 miles from their location .

EQD2Zl1AoZeRuQXd5g7Ulw.text: Best wings in Charlotte...hands down. Sparky delight sprinkled with a little lemon pepper it's love in your mouth. They're opening one on freedom drive in Charlotte NC as well. Check em' out...great wings and great prices!

yCzWAcmQNg31UXLyamB3aw.text: We ordered the wings which are perfection, the honey teriyaki is great... Well all the wing sauces that we had were good (honey mustard, honey teriyaki, spicy honey mustard, and mild)! Please try the buffalo shrimp! YUM! We also had the bacon cheeseburger it was great wasn't dry at all. The delivery time was the icing on the cake I was told delivery would take a hour when I placed the order however I heard a knock on my door at 25 minutes after my delivery order was placed! I'll definitely order from here again!

ybABG0xaUpj6zxPgeyLz9g.text: We have been ordering from this place for years. The wings are always on the spot but the other menu items are not really what you can say getting your money's worth. The salads use to be really good but now you pay around $10.00 for a tray of iceburg lettuce with hardly any toppings, your lucky to get two small slices of tomatoes, two slices of cucumbers, I ordered a chicken salad and it probably has one small tender on top that is sliced thin. Oh and make sure you order extra ranch because it only comes with a 2oz dressing, not even enough to disperse on your salad. The service has really went downhill in the past few years and this use to be our go to spot for lunch. :(

fPFphGHmx1thMaYzbgOYgA.text: Love their Garlic Parm wings!! They're my favorite!!We've also ordered the pizza and fries and everything has always been delicious.

CV7-yGCb4Ha0vmf1XzPwiA.text: Very disappointed!!!! I  referred a group of my co workers to try TLC for our lunch break being from Upstate NY I love TLC wings and I feel like they remind of the part of New York that I am missing... when I called to place a nice sized order for delivery I was instantly greeted with horrible customer service still wanting to place the order.. I was bluntly placed on hold and was under the impression they did not want to take my order for delivery asking questions with  attitudes and frustrations  ... Asking to speaking   with a manger after the conversation with the employee the manger did not show any sympathy and canceled the order... It really is disappointing because I talked so highly of the business and every time my family  comes from New York we eat at TLC... sorry but they will never  get any of my money and those honey hot wings be so good....  I am so disappointed I never write reviews... but I have referred so many people to you guys... treat your loyal  customers the right way ... now  my employees never want to order there as well.... Guess we will try another wing spot.....I am sure the owner does not operate his business like this....

BrC0Th84zJtn7131woqVqw.text: Love this place. Excellent for luncheon with co workers, chill spot, and cool staff.  My favorite wing flavors are: Cajun Honey Teriyaki Lemon Pepper Garlic Parmesan   I heard the Georgia Reds are good.  Jerk flavor, not so good.   Seasoned fries and fried pickle spears are pretty good.

xwIERFRh594V-j8dlQk0tQ.text: The food is excellent.  The staff is about as unprofessional as it gets.  I would recommend ordering to go.

-baBimUQFR5A7iiXBJt8LQ.text: This is my favorite wing place. The owners are really nice and they are very accomodating if you have any special instructions for your wings. Lots of flavor combinations. This is a place where you want to place your order to go. I suggest the Red Tang flavor. Yum !! They are also now doing Pizza although I've never tried it. tlcwingsandgrill.com

LV30jg1Zfc33d8o93TTafg.text: It's very simple. These are "some" of the best chicken wings around. I said "some" since I have not tasted a large number of establishments that serve them. I'm selective when it comes to wing sauce, and favor the vinegar based " tangy" sauces. TLC's "Red Tang"sauce it my favorite. Just the right amount of heat for me. For those of you who love to show off how hot you can stand it, there is a hotter sauce. I know this because it's called "X-tra" hot.  The inside of the restaurant is small and basic. The young lady who runs the register is very congenial and is quick to tell repeat customers how much she appreciates them. I order all "drummies" and the amount of meat on each one of those is more than just about any other wing place that I've tried, however "Sticky Fingers" (Ballantyne) has the same amount of meat as "TLC".

qzP1ZTlTx1-9l-ikyw8t8Q.text: Ive been a customer for years and i went there today amd my chicken sandwhich i ordered it was completely frozen i took it back and they made me a new one with no sauce on it and it was completely dried out and over cooked. And the guy wanted to argue back. Im never going back.

LOM03TlQ0iGZy-w0-SdrOw.text: This is my favorite Wing place, whether I go in person or have my food delivered. The owners are nice and so are those they have working with them. Even when they have forgotten something on my order during a delivery, they made sure to bring it back promptly. I think they are very accommodating.

XPJm4yXPHyTrBpSWPbBb1Q.text: I reviewed TLC back in Feb., and you can read that one for yourself. I complained about the attitude and attention given the customers which was so bad I didn't want to go back. If I can speak plainly about their faults, then when they do good, I feel it should be noted as well. I've been several times now here in Sep. and Oct., and the teenagers are gone. There's an adult running the kitchen now, and a mature, helpful person on the register, and I'd like to think my earlier review had something to do with making these changes. The wings are still the best around, and now its a treat to go in and pick up some delicious wings (which are done when promised), and promptly be served, waited on, and out the door in a hurry. I don't try many flavors because the terriaki is just the BOSS, but my wife likes the honey BBQ, and I'm sure the rest are equally good. The problems seem to be worked out on the service, and their wings were always the best, so I can recommend that you even go out of your way to try the wings at TLC, and feel confident in saying you won't be disappointed!!

zbhAvIhvypiURxSlDm1I0A.text: I had lunch at TLC Wings on a Saturday about 1 pm.  There was only one other person inside when I came in.  I ordered 10 wings, hot, and a basket of fries.  I got my drink and sat down to wait for my food.  They had a football game on the flat screen TV.   It took about 20 minutes to get my food.  The sauce on the wings was very good, typical Buffalo style sauce.  The wings themselves were a little over cooked, but still OK.  The fries were good, but they put a seasoned salt on which I would have them leave off next time.  Overall this is a nice place and I would have given a more stars, but a 20 minute wait for 10 wings and fries is ridiculous.  My recommendation, skip eating in here and order your wings to go.

it8PzygUVZq80ApE42PB4w.text: This place has great wings . Ate here at least 50 times. If you want wings for the super bowl you better order them at least 4 days prior to the game or you want get any do to the very high volume of orders.   So you can ignore Sara P's  comment below.

3q4LLuqgtirrDay0pcA_mw.text: I was craving some wings all Day Wednesday and had missed the all you can eat special at Quaker Steak & Lube by a day.  I relayed my need for wings and a friend of mine told me about this place and since it was close to where I needed to be decided to check them out.  I purchased 20 wings (half honey bbq and half honey teriyaki) and while the honey bbq were good, the honey teriyaki were PHENOMENAL....they were soooo good that I actually went back the next night to get an order of 25 so I'd have some leftover....So glad I found this little spot and will definitely be my go to especially since THEY DELIVERY to my complex....WOOHOO!!!

KhTKc0L3OJky4u_Ul_zx0A.text: We ordered 75 wings for the game, 25 XHot and the rest Hot.  I had a work training and wasn't able to eat the wings until a few hours after they were picked up, but even in that sad and slightly dried up state the XHot wings were delicious!   Definitely hot enough for someone who really likes spiciness. All of our guests raved about them as well.  I would definitely recommend TLC for their awesome wings!

W4XOVpiVqglTLi1XxjIewA.text: The people here are very nice. Took my order quickly. I ordered garlic Parmesan wings and buffalo shrimp. Both were prepared quickly and tasted very good! Shrimp were sizable and the wings had crispy skin. I went on a Sunday and the place was very clean. I will be going back!!

IH6GdNd1BBh-2GOUKwuBWw.text: Someone told my wife to grab some Cajun ranch wings on the way home and let's just say I am one happy husband!! They are sooooo good. The wings are a great size, they are fried to perfection and the Cajun ranch sauce is to die for. Top 3 wings I've had in Charlotte!!!

1ehsRfiUi3poF76XG_mrwg.text: This place has amazing wings I took my Grandson and Husband and I didn't want any because I don't like wings but I tasted the wings and ordered some to-go my favorite sauce it buffalo mild at first they did look a little burnt but the weren't at all the were very delicious. The bathrooms are very clean and the place itself is very nice. The service is very quick too. Recommended very highly.

3KWRmAF2mZS7BhZgRbOVHQ.text: I work close by and come here often. The food is alway fresh. They drop the wings as soon as you order. My food is always burning hot when I get it. They don't skimp on the sauce and ranch. The prices are very reasonable. Nice little hole in the wall

4iFXrc7KuN3h5tqGOTemKA.text: Let me start off by saying the wings are very good to me. I typically only get lemon pepper but they're always good and extra crispy! HOWEVER the customer service is terrible (front desk blonde girl). So I called and ordered a veggie burger. First off I ask for my tomatoes on the side. She proceeds to say "well the tomato won't even be touching the bread but okay" the "but okay" is rude and sarcastic and how am I supposed to know how you lay your toppings on the sandwich ?!?! I order the food pick it up go home and try to eat the food. The veggie burger was burnt to a crisp tasted like burnt charcoal. DISGUSTING!! I call in and the lady (blonde chick) is super rude doesn't apologize at all or offer any alternatives. I had something to do afterwards so I couldn't go back to get a new one made and ANYWAYS why did I get a burnt one in the first place?!?! Def not going back get better customer service!!!!!

6VFnvnHTSu7XAdVx5QD6qw.text: Very nice employees. My wings came out before I could think of what to write in the review. I'd say under three mins. Much better than wild wing cafe (if you can even find a parking spot close to the building)

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. WHAT IN THE WORLD ARE THESE ORANGE STICKS DOING WITH MY WINGS..?????? Wings come with CELERY!!! Get your act together!!! NASTY!!

1YeVK885nCOpJJ7NNmbN_w.text: saw that this place delivered so I gave it a shot and I'm so glad I did! Will definitely be ordering again soon!

E6_e8WAI44p6T7kX7OVYfA.text: The wings here are fantastic! They are big, juicy and full of flavor. They have the best hot honey wings and the jerk wings are seasoned perfectly. If you're looking for great wings at a great price, you need to check this joint out. Would have given 5 stars if they served cold beer there, but you can't win them all. Pizza here is good too, but I'm all about the wings, and these are top notch.

iXJ1JEfh-jBI_KDxUogReA.text: I had the garlic parmesan wings and they were really good. The service was great and quick, I was recommended this place and will recommend to someone else. I'm looking forward to trying their other wing flavors.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Garlic parmesan wings

ee-t3Qfw_vCMYcKX2MpRAg.text: Delivery was good for a salad but for everything else I was sadly disappointed. My service from the past like 2 years ago has not been the same I miss how the old workers were nice and friendly with great service ... PLEASE COME BACK !!!!!!

rNOpxopBWDOtYqfYSBV_Ew.text: Wings themselves were meaty and cooked well, however, they put way too much sauce on the wings. I am a huge sauce person but there was so much that it was overpowering. I dabbed a lot off and they were fine. Next time I'll ask for lighter sauce.

hDSlzKAa-bhgiFMKXn66Jw.text: TLC wings is in the cut and most people probably don't even know that they are there.  For starters, I should warn you that I am not a huge wing person.   However, TLC has definitely changed my affiliation with wings.  I normally get their honey bbq wings and the wings are cooked and sauced to perfection.  Any time I have the taste for wings...this is my go to spot.  I've tried other wings in the area, but nothing comes closer.

9FbGRkFmSTyqogY8WLckqg.text: Crispy fries and crispy wings, well done TLC, I will see you again during football season.  Friendly family service and the wings and fries were actually crispy.  Thank you and keep up the good work.

h_oLEqKpGRtbnikLkduJCg.text: These wings are simply amazing! I've had about 5 differ t flavors so far and they each are superb! The staff is knowledgeable and friendly! Store is clean!  Service was fast! I can't wait to go back

lfmibU32l035bByCLPkkvA.text: I used to love this place for the wins and the staff. But I'm not sure if they sold or just changed staff around, but the wings are still great the service as far customer service and management can be worked on.  Tips:Cajun ranch and calypso are great even on the tenders. And the fried mushrooms are awesome. Don't waste your time not  the pizza though

8fQVmFmr9d52Boi-CZVRXA.text: Not the same. Was my favorite wing place. New workers please call the old workers and ask how they did their wings. Please... my boys didn't finish their food

qwyx2XlHGpUOTZHXJT_Fcg.text: Ok so to be honest this was my first time eating from here because from the outside it doesn't look like a place I want to eat. After seeing such a professional website I decided to give it try. I tried to call to place my order at 1:15 and no one answered, so I ordered online at around 1:25pm and it alerted me that the order wouldn't be ready until 2:17 pm. I've worked in a place that served wings and I know they take less than 15 minutes to cook wings, but I gave them the benefit of the doubt that maybe there was a late lunch rush or something. When I arrived at 2:14 pm to pick the food up, the lady who worked there was sweeping and took a while to acknowledge me. It seemed like she was confused as to why someone was inside of this place and then asked why I was there. To which I told her about my online order. Mind you, I am the only person in this place and no one was in the kitchen. Just she and I. It didn't seem like there was a lot going on so it was funny that she had to ask about it and go "check on it" which apparently meant she had to go out back and tell the cook to come in and finish my order. So I'm guessing maybe that's why there was almost an hour wait for 10 wings. Didn't see him wash his hands, but who knows. In my combo I also get a drink which I wasn't given. I think they were hoping I would leave, but after asking if I got a drink she replied "yep." I initially didn't see bad reviews of the food which is why I tried it , but after closer inspection I see other people have had similar experiences with service here. Your food is good, your website is great, your staff needs much improvement and help with customer service. The two stars are for the quality of the food only because the wings were delicious.

-fTkjhBnUR7T5b0eSvK4rw.text: I was a bit hesitant to order online and never try. But the pizza and wings are a great combo and very good!!! Delivery is quick and we use them a lot for pizza night!

mzehp1FWBir0kimPBx5i5g.text: Our office recently placed an order from TLC Wings & Grill.  While they have a huge selection of wings and sauces,  I wasn't really in the mood for chicken wings.  Instead, I opted for the Chicken Parmesan sub ($5.29) with a side order of fries ($1.89).  The chicken parm sub wasn't the smartest  choice for a take-out -- by the time the food arrived, the sauce had sort of soaked into the bread and made it a bit squishy.   However, the flavor was very good and the portion size was huge (thankfully it was already cut in 2 - definitely enough for 2 meals!)  The fries were good, and they were very generous with the portion size of that as well.   I would definitely order this again, but probably not for take-out.   I would also recommend giving these guys a try if you are looking for good quality wings & fries at reasonable prices.

mnoW-qEw2XZE60ABVL6p3A.text: I love this place! They use fresh ingredients, amazing wing sauces and I am very picky about wings and the pizza is equally as delicious. The fact they deliver is also a huge perk. Highly recommended!

54qlb_tFkkoGnqu6WdGxpA.text: I first ate at TLC when then first opened. They were outstanding with great sauces. And their Onion Ring we're the best. Then they changed owners, twice, and I never went back. Moved and returned. First time back after about 4-5 years. Glad I did. Wings crispy and great flavors. The fries were also good and crispy, as I like. Wait time similar to Chick-fil-A. Which tells me that they precook everything. Still very good and it was lunch hour so they may just prep well. I will be back. And I live in Matthews.

nbTJSvO8kPkQk28F1n8Mqg.text: Just order my food we are nurses and we ordered at 10:30 the staff took the order.  The staff didn't give us all our food no fries with the combo or drinks.  The apple sticks and fried pickles were burned.  Wings was dry and hard..Hamburger and buffalo shrimp was burned by the way we only can eat when we can too busy taking care of people.  So our one time to eat we didn't so we was up all night with no food and by the way we spent $50 total.  Thanks TLC Wings... you will be hearing from us.. Rate of negative  zero stars..

RLw9m7p4yEklXWqoFeKhyA.text: I was very disappointed with TLC Wings customer service.   I called Saturday to pre order wings for Father's Day, the person on the phone took the order with my name and phone number and I said I would pick it up at 11:30 am Sunday.   The guy didn't tell me they are not open Sunday at 11:30 am.  I went to the store this morning at 11:33 am.  No one was ever there prepping food. This is simply bad customer service.

TC6-AjyszfF_tp6uGJFT2g.text: Witness to cashier take ice lid off the floor and put it back on the fountain drink machine.  She then ignored my suggestion to clean it.

xzY1HBEbYOj4RdLh4_jJDQ.text: I walk in to pick up my order of wings and observe the cashier chewing on food in the meal prep area. Her words to me were,"You didn't see that " while smiling. Completely unacceptable!

RlrzPy6SJP5xE0YoGYIi0A.text: Favorite wing joint. I had the lemon pepper, honey hot (my fave), and the jerk flavors. I LOVED the jerk, also liked the lemon pepper, and as I previously mentioned, the honey hot flavor is just awesome. I can eat wings from here on a daily basis. The service was much better this time around as well. High praise, TLC!

L2fx5whz9x67aNzWQilLAg.text: Super friendly and fast.  I tried the honey hot, medium and spicy Parmesan wings.  My favorite of the three were the honey hot.  The ranch was really good as well.  My pet peeve is when wing places do not make their own so I was happy that this place me their own.

rGMHfETFWPTExyNrWrwe5Q.text: Great little spot for wings in the south side of town. A lot of to go orders ~ the place is nice - bus station like booths and a TV to watch while you munch on their delicious wings. Haven't tried the pizza yet ...  The wings are good and reasonably priced. Lots of flavors to choose from.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. TLC wings
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Combos offered look good !
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. TLC Wings

i8sBzoCFaxIt14VweHG1BA.text: We had 10  orders and everything was great!!! It was delivered in 40 mins during lunch time.. All food was accounted for!!! I got the boneless chicken wings, with spicy garlic parm and sweet and sour. It was delicious!!!  Buffalo sauce is a little vinegary, / Buffalo chicken salad would be rated as a 2.  Greek salad didn't have much quantity,  Mozzarella stick are delicious, some orders for the regular wings were a little too crispy and dry. But the flavoring was perfect.  Overall I would defiantly order from here again!!

pLvZE7OOI8U_rqe8s7CFSw.text: my experience with the tlc establishment was great! i had 2 days to place a large order for my office party this past thursday & from the time i spoke with manager mustafa everything ran so smoothly. i found out they offered over 40 flavors, and this being our first time ordering mustafa took out the time to let us know of their biggest sellers & must have flavors!! even on the morning of our delivery i had to call mustafa on his cell phone early in the morning to place an order for additional wings, although he wasn't at work yet he took my order and assured me everything would still be delivered between 11-1130am and it was!! mustafa has exceptional customer service skills and the wings was a hit at the office party! because of the awesome service we're looking forward to the next event and doing business with tlc chicken!!

FhtEuNZwVXXnW42u0-ORcw.text: I love these wings!!!  There are so many flavors here....and I've enjoyed a lot of them...like, Hot, Barbecue, Cajun, Lemon Pepper and Spicy Garlic Parmesan and I have not been disappointed yet!   Each wing is juicy and full of flavor, they are always hot and made to order ..SOOOO amazing!   Yes...they have more than just wings....like pizza, subs and fries...but I've only had the wings AND trust me YOU are going to want to try these wings...again and again!!!  In my opinion, these are the best wings in town!

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. 10 pieces and 1 dressing...Cajun Ranch and Spicy Garlic Parmesan

34cFzcx7Br2ezUPfErVAmQ.text: Stopped unexpectedly for dinner. Have driven past this place so many times and even planned to come in. Well I am glad I finally did. Got wings and pizza combo with the red tang (bbq and buffalo combined), lemon pepper, hot ranch, and honey bbq sauces and my goodness definitely some of the best wings in Charlotte nestled in my neighborhood. Super simple and comfy environment for family and quick dinner. Food was hot and fast and the staff was extremely accommodating and kind.

TvRNvboCVonRa0-1gZHRjQ.text: This is a nice little counter joint.  Prices were great and food smells wonderful.  The shopping center looks disgusting but this place was clean and the staff was very friendly.  I will definitely be back.

6fc2VrLqYFsYXnlKheRBDA.text: Wow! Came due to high reviews. Don't let outside appearance deter you! These are the best wings I have had in Charlotte. The woman working the register was also very nice.

uJwsOEVpxIdlOwmGRnGbCw.text: after browsing through yelp in my wing search I came across this place. It's a small restaurant located in a shopping center. I decided to try wings because of all the good reviews. The wings were a very nice size which I loved but the sauces I tried weren't as good as I thought. We got 20 wings with 4 different flavors. Hot, honey BBQ, garlic Parmesan, spicy garlic Parmesan. The number one was honey BBQ off the gate!!! The service was good and it was not a wait. I'll definitely be back to try more flavors and hopefully I'll get better flavors. I'll update my review then. Until next time.

jAJiSTYlJGy2mZN84n5biw.text: Wings are good, really like the extra hot and the hot ranch. But the pizza, not so much. Ordered a sausage pizza and when we opened it up it looked like cut up beef hot dogs or cut up smoked sausage on top like the went next door and grabbed a pack from the grocery store to put on top. Very disappointed, ended up throwing it away, very doughy as well. Stick to the wings for sure

ctYk8Si-vqqE9cf5ghA0xg.text: Solid wings. Solid food. A place to go to that's off the beaten path. Also a decent price as well.

sd-_16U9oubP8UNxgEV__A.text: Service was good and fast! Food is great! So many flavors of wing sauce to chose from... We got Jerk, X Hot & Spicy Parmesan, can't wait to go back and try more flavors! Seasoned fries were on point but I was taken back by the side Greek salad! It was bigger than I expected with the right amount of everything! I loved it..

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Spicy Parmesan wings..
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Jerk wings and X Hot wings... Sooooo yummy!

kwwH8QorL5iX_2yPFLin_g.text: Wings were overcooked which means dry and had very little sauce on them. They also had a "fishy" taste to them so it was probably the same oil they use to cook shrimp in. The buffalo chicken salad was decent and they have good homemade ranch. We ordered a side of french fries with wings and they were also overcooked.

KhOIc_xi1E6RxVtIZ3Ijdg.text: This restaurant has great food I will give them that, but the customer service on every occasion that I have had it has been horrible. There is a young lady that answers the phone and takes the orders every time I'm there and she is very unpleasant. This is there only downfall as she is the first person you come into contact with when calling or entering to place your order.

iAzu4A0YJE6dlx6CjA_ZHg.text: I called in for a to go order for a large cheese pizza and 20 wings. It was good. Pizza was very soft and had lots of cheese on it. My only request is that I wish it had more pizza sauce on it.  Wings were delicious. We got spicy garlic parm and hot buffalo. Garlic parm was crispy and the hot buffalo were spicy but not too spicy. Ranch and blue cheese paired well with it. I would definitely come back.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Large cheese pizza

BtPSQrepqAI1bHcKziAEHg.text: I had a great experience at TLC Wings! We got the wings combo which is your choice of number of wings and then fries and a drink. The fries were SO good, crispy and seasoned and a big portion! I am always curious about how many sauces you can try on your set of wings and they are not a place where it is simple for example, "5 wings to one flavor wing sauce". Here's a small breakdown:  -5 or 7 piece wings get one dipping sauce (ranch or blue cheese) and one sauce on the wings -10 piece wings you get one dipping sauce and choice of two flavors -15 or 20 piece wings you get two dipping sauces and choice of two flavors  -25 piece wings you get two dipping sauces and choice of three wing flavors  -30 piece wings you get three dipping sauces and choice of 3 wing flavors   And it actually goes up to sets of 40,50,75 and 100. If you want an extra ranch, you gotta pay for it, probably because it's that good thick ranch!   Then you can choose how you want your wings cooked we went for Extra Crispy, 15 wings combo with two ranches and hot honey and spicy garlic Parmesan. The food came out FAST and hot! We liked the hot honey a lot more than the spicy garlic parmesan. Both were very crispy as they promised! To sum it up, I would come back to try more flavor of wings and they actually have a whole second menu filled with pizza, tenders, sandwiches and salad.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

evgUQxAeR5xSKXggg_NCjw.text: I've come here a couple of times I do enjoy the honey hot wings the barbecue wings are also good I love that every time I order wings here they are hot and crispy I'm not crazy about the fries here and the inside could be a little bit cleaner for me personally

0WkJCruSweMauRSADjAcuw.text: Best Wings in Charlotte. I consider myself a wing connoisseur and the Georgia red medium and the red tang hot from TLC are my top two flavors from all of my wing spots. Also I consider it a bang for your buck, the wings are a good size for the price, 10 wings and fries fills me up for the day vs 10 wings at any other restaurant will just disappoint me because I am a bulk eater. Customer service is always great when I come, they remember my order and always bring the wings out to you in a timely matter.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

2DFbqrmIWp9NHxYZQde9iw.text: Just moved to the area & was looking for something good to eat & ended up here because of the reviews & I wasn't disappointed. Coming into this place I was a little skeptical but they exceeded beyond my expectations... only downside I kinda had was that 5 wings, fries & a drink comes up to $10 which i think is too much money but honestly it was more than enough food because the wings were a nice size, flavorful and they filled my bag up with fries which were hot and fresh. My food was done in less than 10 minutes! I was shocked! I just think it's a little expensive for take out but I will definitely be back when I want some good wings

XGJqqbt5MM7UyCPEOTW9nw.text: Love to get my wings honey hot light sauce and fries, fried extra crispy. This is the go too spot when my hubby and I cannot make an decision, food is always good and people are always nice to us . I don't like seeing the employees in aprons outside but I guess

C4exdkxaZmBDdJsWzRUnYQ.text: The wings were actually good. We enjoyed the lemon peppers. They are the small wings you will get at buffalo wild wings. They fried and seasoned we'll.

XbUeKmweMO92iljykfUzhw.text: This was our go-to wing place when we lived near Charlotte. We moved to Charleston, SC and have not found a place with wings comparable to TLC wings. They are so AMAZING and perfect every time! Never had a bad experience and tell everyone who we know who still lives upstate to go to TLC for wings.

rQOY2Xnn4PMzqcodPtA3RQ.text: This probably my favorite wing spot in Charlotte. The lunch menu is awesome. You get combo with drink and fries. They are very generous with fries, one batch could feed 2. The wing flavors are very flavorful and wings cooked perfect  I've tried almost all the flavors on menu. I still need to try out their pizza. Oh btw The Buffalo chicken salad taste so good !!

qaocRDgyX0EngcueCROJYg.text: Wife and I stopped in today for a late lunch bite.  We are big Bisonte wing fans and were a little skeptical at first after our neighbors raved about this place.  We're in Waxhaw afterall, which is not exacltly around the corner.  It is worth the drive!  The wings, no matter which of the many flavors you choose, are cooked to a perfect crisp, but not over done.  No rubbery chicken skin on the flats.  To us, these are the best wings in the Charlotte area.  All the fried items are good and not at all greasy.  Service is fast and friendly.  Looking forward to going back and trying other menu items.

Do2pSxlIsrrZY75GoqhPjw.text: Super great wings! If you're looking for finger lickin' (that's right i said it) wings for a steal, this is your stop! It's kind of tucked away in a plaza that i hardly visit but man they deliver so it's not even a problem. They aren't stingy with your ranch and blue cheese either. The service was good too. Only reason they arent 5stars is because the blue cheese was weak but that's all! I have to put it all out there

uGiyP84ej81E6P-or1dN_g.text: I had a taste for wings but I don't eat fried food very often so I wanted to be sure that it worth it. They did not disappoint.  The prices are great and the service was friendly. The location was clean and bright.  I ordered 5 honey hot wings, extra crispy and after the first bite I wished that I had ordered more! I can't wait to try some other items on the menu.

kxKInzcWZXX8y9XpgDfoCw.text: No frills joint with great food. They have quite a few sauces that you can mix and match. Honey hot wings for the win.

Yw89yWklQ2MQmnWAFS8gZw.text: The wings are absolutely amazing!  Since moving from Houston almost a year ago; I have been looking for a new wing spot!  I think that I have found it!  Great flavors, fresh wings and good service!  You can't beat that!

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

6fm7wC61OKnCcJepWVGZfg.text: ahhh fantastic place, perfect win, I called in for a to go order for a large cheese pizza and 20 wings. It was good. Pizza was very soft and had lots of cheese on it. My only request is that I wish it had more pizza sauce on it.  Wings were delicious. We got spicy garlic parm and hot buffalo. Garlic parm was crispy and the hot buffalo were spicy but not too spicy. Ranch and blue cheese paired well with it. I would definitely come back.

TBrhheOVKrIhqePeB2tUog.text: The fries omg! Fresh and perfect crisp to it. The staff is pretty cool. It's a simple restaurant for wings! I've tried Cajun and hot wings both are good the price and the options plus the flavors are all really good.

-mGOp-qtu7RqijXOy7Sqjg.text: TLC has got to be in consideration for the top 3 wing spots in Charlotte. It's a small family run establishment that never disappoints.   I always order the 15 piece combo which comes with a side and a drink. There is a good mix of spicy, sweet, and inventive sauces for your wings and the wings are always the perfect combination of juicy with a firm and slightly crispy exterior. Most wing places that do take out usually leave you with soggy wings by the end of your commute but TLC stays crisp.  It's a little out of the way if you don't live in Pineville, but I'll gladly go out of my way for the quality.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

ChREUbBoNh3_VWtJnpRonQ.text: I wish I could leave no stars... to add onto Netake A comment. I was included in the group of people that ordered the burnt fried pickles and buffalo shrimp. The buffalo shrimp were burnt and the sauce greasy. It was terrible. As stated we spent $50 and couldn't even eat the food. I want a refund...we were so disappointed. This was my first and last time eating and this dump. Negative 15 stars. Calling themselves TLC wings. More like death row wings.

521LTfkNL_yLK0WenhyV0w.text: Good, fast, crispy wings. Their ranch is AMAZING, if you are a ranch junkie like myself you must try it ! Will definitely be back, atmosphere isn't the best so I definitely suggest getting your order to-go . Lemon Pepper & Honey Hot are both delish !!

hBxNJP1mCiSJr-i3lz6uKA.text: I read a lot of reviews before I tried this place. My expectations were supper high! I wouldn't say I'm disappointed but I was let down. I tried the traditional wings and the boneless wings and honestly the only thing I would have again is their boneless wings but even that was 5/10.

xCx6maydWaoiOFZ3Vrfg3w.text: Best wings in Charlotte!! No seriously, they're the best.   This place is designed as a carry out restaurant but they're some tables to dine in, if you choose. They have a list of unique wing flavors to pick from; some of my faves are:  Red Tang - Spicy lemon pepper  Spicy garlic Parmesan Spicy teriyaki Cajun ranch  They are quick and fry those wings up to perfection. The fried shrimp tossed in your choice of sauce is a winner too.   I've literally been coming to this place for years. If you're in the Pineville area, head over. 10/10

pjjJmLU6V2WNIsBQXqOyew.text: Over the years we have gone through many different owners of TLC. The wings use to be really good, cooked just right with the right amount of sauce. They have gotten progressively worse. So when we order we ask that they don't over cook the wings cashier says no worries I'll take care of it. Our fault for trusting  that they will actually do what they said. WRONG! It was beyond over cooked it was hard as if it was over cooked the night before, left out all night uncovered and refried. Just THAT hard  When you call their cashiers not only don't speak English really well they just don't understand. The guy argued that it was not over cooked and told me I was wrong!!  who does that! So in the pouring rain we took it back and yet they argue with you. While the cashier was licking his fingers after he threw a chicken home out in the trash. That's against health department rules Done with this place.

BNLgMyDXqtHsafl9dCgzCQ.text: Best wings in Charlotte!!  What a great little hole-in-the-wall!  This place serves more than just wings.  The wings are juicy and crispy!  Crispy!!!  Nobody should go for limpy wings!!  The sauces were loaded on so the wings are extra wet, in my opinion.  Very flavorful sauces.  The ranch and blue cheese were thick and the dressing stuck to the wings.  The onion rings were thick and sweet.  The fries were also fresh; they had a crispy outside and soft inside, they were perfect.  The cashier/cook were friendly and talked to me while I waited for my order.  This place does mostly take out and delivery, but there is seating inside.  Even though I live on the opposite side of town, I would come here again, for sure!!

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Mild buffalo, traditional
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Hot ranch, traditional
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Onion Rings

9aXBQcRjoxEQ-8tGitlh1A.text: TLC wings is one of my favorite wing spots in Charlotte. Only issue I have with them is that the consistency is all over the place. Some days are much better than others but when it's good it's really good! This is one of those places I'll drive out my way to get wings. Delicious flavors & customer service is good. On a normal day wait time on wings is about 10mins

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

qYHManeum9-aAMmxhYuCSA.text: I drove about 25 minutes to get these wings based off a review from my friend. I got the homer hot which were delicious. They came with fries as well. It's a small space with tables and one long table in the middle for a party of about 10. The staff was very nice and the food came hot and fast. I would definitely take the drive again to get the same order.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Honey Hot

MPGItHloQQrk52n69jEowg.text: Excellent!  My husband is a Buffalo native and this place made him a bit homesick!  Don't let the rundown strip mall turn you off this place is the real deal.    And to the one bad reviewer...who orders boneless wings at a wing place???  It's insulting!  And your ranch dressing got warm?  I don't know any place that doesn't put the sauce in with the wings otherwise it might spill and make a mess.

AhslLVjHxEwFkHNicX2X9A.text: Spicy garlic Parmesan, Bermuda Burn, hot ranch were my favorite 3 flavors of wings. We also ordered honey teriyaki, sparkys delight. Those were my least favorite flavors

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Bermuda burn on the left Sparkys delight in the right
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

fsdosoO9jXTL7nP6qmNSyQ.text: If I could give TLC no stars, I would. I just got back to my hotel with my dinner order and it is inedible. I am a buffalo wing lover and I could not even put one of TLC's wings close to my mouth.  First, the boneless wings look like frozen chicken nuggets that are covered in freezer burn. When you get wings, you expect for them to be cover in sauce... my sauce was sitting in the box under the wings. It's like they didn't even try to put the sauce on the actual wings. How hard is it to toss wings in the sauce?   Second, they put the ranch sauce in the box with the wings so it was hot when I opened it. No one wants warm ranch dressing. The point is to have a refreshing chill to go with the hot wings.  The only redeeming thing about TLC was that they offer fried pickles. They were decent, but again, ranch was hot and not able to be used as a dip for the pickles.  Do not bother eating here... pure disappointment!

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Worst Boneless Buffalo Wings in the world!!

lmGQtkbE2maVdPVP60MahQ.text: so good!!! i just had their fried pickles and the chicken salad and bam!

k-9Ot9-NKZbPty8YcStAUA.text: Best Chicken wings in the 485 loop! I wish they delivered to my house. I believe I had the honey hot flavored wings, I have been raving about them for months now! Definitely a hidden secret.

4yKv0wDsQMCKGymh7cbINQ.text: The wings were so good! They had a lot of flavors to pick from and different deals on pizza and wings.

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States. Honey mustard and hot honey mustard
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States

JZTN-6qV61MiYK3StZLGmA.text: Pros: Wings were good size. Lemon pepper wings were good. Hot and fresh Cons: Jerk wings. They were some weird sweet sauce. Definitely would NOT recommend

Z0yE6REzhcbTA1NkLUuJGg.text: it's so frustrating that every single time we order take out from here.... something is missing in the order. I really wish you guys would take the time to review your orders beforehand. I literally just had a salad delivered for myself with NO dressing, and wings for my husband with NO dipping sauce... which I specifically ordered!

piXHNYKehtYvaI6n9N8dFw.text: Every time I'm in town I come to this restaurant because the service is excellent and the food is even better. Chicken wings are my favorite dining experience, and this place is one of the best in town. Not only is the service quick but it's also very affordable. I highly recommend it and I think you'll be very pleased if you'll give it a try. As far as I can tell wings and pizza are the number one and two choices on the menu.

b_t4A23dotTLsB53BRa8uQ.text: I love wings and I have been searching for a wing spot near my house for a while and this place is it for me. The wings are a perfect size, lots of flavor, and reasonably priced. I'm glad I tried this place and I look forward to going back!

oXqDXPU20JnkeePgThkcUw.text: When I moved into the area everyone told me these were the best wings around.  7 years later I still purchase TLC for luncheons for work and just for my own lunch.  Fast Delivery, consistently good food and large portions.  I Love TLC!

GUKYJ2N42SVJxCiezDFQGQ.text: I ordered food for the fist time from this place. Honestly I made the selection to order from here based off of what post mates would deliver to. The lemon pepper wings were decent, a little hard but manageable. However the Pizza; I've had better out of the frozen section in Harris Teeter.

CFphdaWvNAjlJGotyn5lqw.text: BOMB wings and fries!! This is the BEST place to get tasty, fresh, finger-lickin good chicken wings. They are always crispy and flavorful! Don't even get me started on the sauces because they are EVERYTHING! I recommend the garlic parmesan, lemon pepper, and hot. The French fries, pizza, and mozzarella sticks are also very delicious and fresh as well. To top this review all off, the staff are awesome! They're always on top of the game and they make sure you're satisfied with your order!

TQFz2188BJT2ygiUYKhp3Q.text: This place has the best wings and fries I've had around Charlotte. The sauces are a little different but it sets them apart from other places and they're good. There are also plenty of other menu options too if you're one of those weird people that don't like wings. The price is right and they're very quick as well.

XcGZSVyfUgjTXaH0qP9BFA.text: I love their medium boneless wings!! The medium sauce is sooo delishhhh  Better than Buffalo Wild Wings and Wing King Cafe! My husband loves their traditional hot wings. The chicken is good quality. We are always satisfied with our selection at TLC. Quality wings and quick service! It's a small place but people were in and out picking up to go orders the whole time we were eating in. Try this place!! The wings are fried to crispy perfection!!

photos.caption: Photo of TLC Wings & Grill - Pineville, NC, United States
